name: vscode-extention-js-console
description: VSCode extension. Easily insert console statements.

keybindings.when: editorTextFocus && editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == vue || editorLangId == html
editorTextFocus && editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == vue || editorLangId == html
editorTextFocus && editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == vue || editorLangId == html
editorTextFocus && editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == vue || editorLangId == html

commandPalette.when: editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == vue || editorLangId == html
editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == vue || editorLangId == html
editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == vue || editorLangId == html
editorLangId == javascript || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == vue || editorLangId == html

js-console.textColor.description: Enter the text color for console.log.(ex: #23d541, #ff0, etc...)

js-console.endWithSemicolon.description: Place a semicolon at the end of the console statement line.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
